column2: Unique identifier for each facility location (e.g., MC_ER001_East, MC_ER002_West).
Official name of the ER facility.
Total bed count within the ER department.
Number of beds reserved for critical care patients.
Count of low-acuity Fast-Track bays available for minor (level 4) cases. Capacity may differ between East and West hospitals.
Count of standard ER treatment beds.
